title: Block02 fontstruction
content:
Hi typophiles, Block02 is the new experimental fontface by BlueTypo inspired in patterns and dotted typography, performs well in large sizes. The principal function is decorative.  
This font is optimized for Flash and it is best displayed at a font-size of 32.

download:  
 [http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/210018](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014025753/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/210018 "http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/210018")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014025753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/block02_5895.jpg)
author: BlueTypo
